name: Dung Beetle (Pixel-Team)
description:
Dingleberries are the key ingredient in Dung Beetle's favorite breakfast cereal: Crapped'In Crunch. But they're not just for breakfast anymore.  Deep within a giant pile of doo doo lies a motherlode of dingleberries, and they're all there for the taking! The problem is, a gang of angry wasps has also claimed this pile of doo doo for themselves. It's up to you Dung Beetle, to eat your way through miles and miles of animal scat to find your favorite delicacy, while fending off the wasps with your secret weapon: Chewed up and spit out Dung Balls. I'm getting ill just typing this. Critics are calling it the worst videogame they've ever played. But the folks down at the Gamemaker Community Forums awarded it "Turd Place" in the GMC39 Jam. Now you can take home the game that has all the action and excitement of being a truly 'Pathetic Creature."

Instructions:

WASD - Movement

SPACE - Attack
